title: Textile, 1930
medium:
Medium: piña (pineapple) fiber, cotton
Technique: plain weave with supplementary weft
description: Length of sheer piña cloth subdivided into vertical bands of pale green, pale pink, pale yellow, and brocaded with delicate stylized serpentining flowering vines in blue, pink, green, yellow, and white cotton. Two plain cloth selvages terminating in thicker bunch of fibers. Purchased in Manila market.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1930.
1930. Medium: piña (pineapple) fiber, cotton
Technique: plain weave with supplementary weft. Gift of Frances Morris. 1951-111-86.
